mapper.sql: select role.id role_id, role.org_id role_orgId, role.name role_name, role.code role_code, role.is_forbidden role_isForbidden, role.is_delete role_isDelete, role.create_time role_createTime, role.modify_time role_modifyTime, role.comments role_comments

select distinct role.id role_id, role.org_id role_orgId, role.name role_name, role.code role_code, role.is_forbidden role_isForbidden, role.is_delete role_isDelete, role.create_time role_createTime, role.modify_time role_modifyTime, role.comments role_comments

role.id role_id, role.org_id role_orgId, role.name role_name, role.code role_code, role.is_forbidden role_isForbidden, role.is_delete role_isDelete, role.create_time role_createTime, role.modify_time role_modifyTime, role.comments role_comments
left join role_permit_relation rolePermitRelation on rolePermitRelation.role_id=role.id left join user_role_relation userRoleRelation on userRoleRelation.role_id=role.id
left join role_permit_relation rolePermitRelation on rolePermitRelation.role_id=role.id
left join user_role_relation userRoleRelation on userRoleRelation.role_id=role.id

sql.if:
order by
role.${item} desc
role.${item} asc

mapper.sql: select distinct userRoleRelation.user_id userRoleRelation_userId, userRoleRelation.role_id userRoleRelation_roleId
inner join role role on role.id=userRoleRelation.role_id inner join user user on user.id=userRoleRelation.user_id
inner join role role on role.id=userRoleRelation.role_id
inner join user user on user.id=userRoleRelation.user_id

sql.if:
order by
userRoleRelation.${item} desc
userRoleRelation.${item} asc
